description:
### 11.281 vmafmotion

Obtain the average VMAF motion score of a video. It is one of the component
metrics of VMAF.

The obtained average motion score is printed through the logging system.

The filter accepts the following options:

**stats_file**

    If specified, the filter will use the named file to save the motion score of each frame with respect to the previous frame. When filename equals "-" the data is sent to standard output. 

Example:

    
    
    ffmpeg -i ref.mpg -vf vmafmotion -f null -
name: vmafmotion

options.description: If specified, the filter will use the named file to save the motion score of each frame with respect to the previous frame. When filename equals "-" the data is sent to standard output.
options.name: stats_file
